name: Mentoring and Mental Health
content: There is a pandemic that no one wishes to acknowledge and that is the mental health, mental well-being pandemic. This webinar will address the skeleton that is in the closet. We will look at what some of the signals are and how a mentor can be part of that support structure and assist in the healing process. Why Should You Attend With the increase in mental health challenges support structures are challenged to provide the support that is required to address this silent pandemic. This webinar will provide you with insight into the challenges and will demonstrate how mentoring can be part of the healing process. Objectives of the Presentation » Explain what mental health is and what are some of the symptoms. » Explain what the impact can be on the organization » Explain what the role of the mental health mentor is » Explain how mentoring can be part of the support structure and assist in the healing process. » Explain what is the different between PTS and OSI Areas Covered in the Session » What is mental health? » What is PST » What is OSI » What are some of the symptoms » What is the role of the mental health mentor » The role of the Journey Mentor Who Will Benefit » This is a webinar that will provide insight to all that attend – no matter what level they are at in an organization.
